member.name: T:TinyMapper.TinyMapper
member.summary: TinyMapper is an object to object mapper for .NET. The main advantage is performance. TinyMapper allows easily map object to object, i.e. properties or fields from one object to another.

member.summary: Maps the source to Target type. The method can be called in parallel to Map methods, but cannot be called in parallel to Bind method.

member.name: M:TinyMapper.TinyMapper.Map(System.Type,System.Type,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Maps the source to Target type. The method can be called in parallel to Map methods, but cannot be called in parallel to Bind method.

member.name: M:TinyMapper.TinyMapper.Map``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Maps the source to Target type. The method can be called in parallel to Map methods, but cannot be called in parallel to Bind method.
member.returns: Mapped object. The method can be called in parallel to Map methods, but cannot be called in parallel to Bind method.
